name: Snackbowl Railgun!
description:
It's the 80s. You got heaps of mixed snacks.  But the boss, he don't like mixed snacks.  He wants you to separate out the snacks using a rail gun. Totally makes sense.

Move your mouse/touch around to aim.  Click to shoot. Hold to autofire.  Make the boss happy.

Some of the snacks are extra tricky. (its an 80s style game!) You'll have to bounce off the bowl or catch the perfect angle to clear sausages from the floor and cashews from a corner.  The seemingly impossible is possible with effort... like an 80s arcade game!

All graphics, sound effects, programming and music were created from scratch during the Gdevelop Game Jam 3 by Avery and Andrew Dean.  

All the real credit goes to whoever coded the physics 2.0 engine in Gdevelop.
